com.intrasonics.heartbeatengine

Interface IHeartbeatEngineListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEngineListener

    public interface IHeartbeatEngineListener
extends IEngineListener
    The interface for receiving events from the Heartbeat Engine.

    The Heartbeat Engine generates accurately timed heartbeats that are synchronised to real-time encoded audio. These events are passed to any object that implements this interface, and that has connected to the Heartbeat Engine through the connectEngineListener method in the com.intrasonics.Decoder class.

    This interface presents methods that provide you with information about key events from the Heartbeat Engine, such as when it generates a heartbeat or encounters an error.

      The Heartbeat Engine cycle type.
